name: Dura Build
overview:
Established in the year 1998, at Delhi, (India), we, “Dura Build Care Pvt. Ltd.,” are an ISO 9001:2008 certified counted among renowned Manufacturer and Supplier of qualitative range of Water Proofing Compound, Cementitious Polymer & Waterproof Coating, Concrete Admixtures, Curing & Mould Release, Bonding Agen & Epoxy, Flooring Compound, Silicone Water Repellent, Grouting Compound, Tiling Compound, Repair & Rehabilitation and Joint Sealant.

Research & Development: The testing/Quality Control/R & D facilities of our organization are situated at Bahadurgarh Modern Industrial Estate, Haryana can invoke admiration from both scientists as well as civil engineers. Our quality testing lab is installed with the most modern equipment and engineering machinery. These machines help us to conduct various qualitative tests so that our customers benefit from use of our products.

Our Infrastructure: In order to accomplish our objective of manufacturing and trading high performance range of products, we have always relied on our sound infrastructural base. We have developed a hi-tech division for the production of these products. The division is installed with advanced machines and equipment of international quality standards.

Our Quality Assurance: We are a quality conscious organization and as a result of that, we are engaged in providing our customers premium quality range of products. These products are manufactured using high grade raw material and sophisticated technology at our hi-tech manufacturing unit.

Why Us ?: International quality standard range Well equipped manufacturing facility Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices
